name: @substrate/smoldot-light
description: Light client that connects to Polkadot and Substrate-based blockchains
author: Parity Technologies <admin@parity.io>

scripts.buildAll: tsc -p tsconfig-mjs.json && tsc -p tsconfig-cjs.json && bash fix-package-type
scripts.prepublishOnly: node prepare.mjs --release && rimraf ./dist && yarn run buildAll
scripts.build: node prepare.mjs --release && rimraf ./dist && yarn run buildAll
scripts.demo:cjs: node prepare.mjs --debug && rimraf ./dist && yarn run buildAll && node demo/demo.cjs
scripts.demo:mjs: node prepare.mjs --debug && rimraf ./dist && yarn run buildAll && node demo/demo.mjs
scripts.test: node prepare.mjs --debug && rimraf ./dist && yarn run buildAll && ava --timeout=2m --concurrency 2 --no-worker-threads
